Constants.Name: MyFirstSupportAgent.NumberOfChunksRetrieved
Constants.Description: Determines the maximum number of results when retrieving nearest neighbors from the knowledge base. This is used for static data retrieval.

Constants.Name: MyFirstSupportAgent.NumberOfTicketsRetrieved
Constants.Description: Determines the maximum number of results when retrieving nearest neighbors from the knowledge base. This is used for similar tickets retrieval.

Constants.Name: CommunityCommons.MergeMultiplePdfs_MaxAtOnce
Constants.Description:
Restricted to 10 files at once for Mendix Cloud v4 compatibility. If you need to merge more than 10 files increase the number here. Setting the value to <=0 means unlimited.

Note: We very strongly recommend to not increase the number for applications running in Mendix Cloud v4.

Constants.Name: ConversationalUI.EnableMarkdownViewer
Constants.Description: When set to true, assistant messages written in Markdown format are rendered as such. If set to false messages are rendered as plain text.

Constants.Name: ConversationalUI.UserInputInstructions
Constants.Description:
The text that is displayed below the user input field in the chat. This can be used for keystroke instructions or general GenAI disclaimers.
If you leave it blank, nothing will be displayed.
Constants.DefaultValue: Press Enter to submit, Shift+Enter for a new line. Please validate the output.

Constants.Name: Encryption.EncryptionKey
Constants.Description:
This key will be used to encrypt and decrypt values.
The length of this key must be 32 characters.

Constants.Name: Encryption.EncryptionPrefix
Constants.Description:
Prefix for stored encrypted values.
This value is used to determine whether the value has been already encrypted.
The prefix must be either {AES}, {AES2} or {AES3}.
Encryption is only supported if the prefix is {AES3}.
It is not recommended to change this value.

Constants.Name: Encryption.LegacyEncryptionKey
Constants.Description:
This key will be used to decrypt values that are encrypted with legacy algorithms.
The length of this key must be 16 characters.

Constants.Name: Encryption.LogNode
Constants.Description: Node which appears in log messages for this module.

Constants.Name: GenAICommons.StoreTraces
Constants.Description:
This controls whether Trace data is stored in the operations that follow the principles of GenAI Commons.

If StoreTraces is set to true, Usages are created as well even if the StoreUsageMetrics constant was set to false.

Constants.Name: GenAICommons.StoreUsageMetrics
Constants.Description:
This controls whether Usage data is stored in the operations that follow the principles of GenAI Commons. Currently only chat completions and embeddings support token usage storage.

If StoreTraces is set to true, Usages are created as well even if the StoreUsageMetrics constant was set to false.

Constants.Name: GenAICommons.Trace_CleanUpAfterDays
Constants.Description:
Controls the cleanup interval in days for the Trace data. If a positive value is set, Trace records are kept for the specified amount of days (UTC), older records are deleted in ScE_Usage_Cleanup, if enabled for the environment in the Mendix Cloud portal.
If this constant is set to empty, zero or a negative value, nothing will be deleted.

Constants.Name: GenAICommons.Usage_CleanUpAfterDays
Constants.Description:
Controls the cleanup interval in days for the Usage data. If a positive value is set, Usage records are kept for the specified amount of days (UTC), older records are deleted in ScE_Usage_Cleanup, if enabled for the environment in the Mendix Cloud portal.
If this constant is set to empty, zero or a negative value, nothing will be deleted.

ScheduledEvents.Name: GenAICommons.ScE_Trace_Cleanup
ScheduledEvents.Description: This is a cleanup of Trace data. See constant @GenAICommons.Trace_CleanUpAfterDays for more information.

ScheduledEvents.Name: GenAICommons.ScE_Usage_Cleanup
ScheduledEvents.Description: This is a cleanup of Usage data (token consumption monitor). See constant @GenAICommons.Usage_CleanUpAfterDays for more information.
